title: Knowledge Quickening
description: Charlotte Duncan has been kidnapped by an unknown enemy, leaving her frightened and facing an uncertain future. Filled with worry for the man she loves and the members of his group whom she considers friends, Charlotte must find a way to escape the nightmare she is enduring.Using the remarkable psychic gift she has recently embraced is impossible, because Charlotte learns it is those very abilities which led to her current predicament. Charlotte must find a way to escape the clutches of her kidnapper, drawing on a strength and determination she never knew existed...and will have to give her trust to a complete stranger in return for his help. In doing so, Charlotte will discover many new things about herself that she would never have believed possible... and will face a future wildly different to the one she imagined.
author: D.S. Williams
